General.Name: Arcure SA
General.Description: Arcure S.A. develops artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for enhancing the autonomy of industrial machinery worldwide. The company provides Blaxtair, an AI-enabled pedestrian detection system for industrial vehicles. It also offers Omega, a smart and robust stereoscopic camera that calculates the disparity map and provides metadata to the user. Arcure S.A. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Pantin, France.
